summary: Diff adds build/version stamping utilities and diagnostics updates, plus a deployment verification checklist. However, evidence for an actual successful redeploy is not present, and build-time HTML meta stamping may still rely on placeholder substitution that cannot be confirmed from the diff alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Redeploy the application to the live environment and confirm the deployment completes successfully (no deployment error) and that the live app loads.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes a verification checklist, but no evidence of an executed redeploy (e.g., CI/CD config, deployment logs, or any change that demonstrates a completed live deployment).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the deployed HTML contains a non-empty meta[name="app-version"] value that is not a placeholder pattern.
missing_requirements.reason: The source HTML still contains a placeholder string (%VITE_BUILD_TIMESTAMP%) in the meta tag. While runtime fallback stamping is added, the requirement explicitly calls for the deployed HTML meta content to be non-empty/non-placeholder; build-time substitution is implied but not provable from this diff summary alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Added iOS Safari cache-busting meta directives (Cache-Control/Pragma/Expires) in the HTML.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested by the BuildRequest requirements (which focus on version stamping and diagnostics), though it is related to stale asset concerns.
